#Tinytex
#Setter eval til FALSE for aa ikke evaluere kode n√•r man lager dokumentet

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("tinytex")
library(tinytex)
install_tinytex()

```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
costofliving <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sbjorkholt/ISSSV1337/main/Week%201/Day%203%20-%20Introduction%20to%20data%20analysis%20and%20data%20transformation/Tasks/costofliving.csv")
```


```{r}
install.packages("janitor")
library(janitor)

costofliving_clean<-costofliving %>%
  clean_names()
  
  
```

## Tidyverse functions

-select
-filter
-mutate
-rename
-group_by
-summarise

### Select 

```{r}
costofliving_subset <- costofliving_clean %>%
  select(cost_of_living_index,groceries_index)
```

```{r}
costofliving_clean_subset <- costofliving_clean %>%
  select(cost_of_living_index)
```
